sentences.sentence: The launderer can control the loan through trusted associates instead of a bank.
sentences.translation: 可以控制的洗黑钱的贷款，通过值得信赖的助手，而不是银行。

sentences.sentence: Criminal forfeiture involves proven criminals. A convicted bank robber may lose his getaway car; a money-launderer may lose the house he bought with his illicit profits.
sentences.translation: 刑事没收包括已被证实的犯罪，例如没收抢银行者用于逃跑的汽车，没收洗钱者用不法钱财购得的房屋。
